Class ExcelReaderUtil

java.lang.Object
fileUtil.ExcelReaderUtil
public class ExcelReaderUtil extends Object
excelUtil class provides utility methods to read and manipulate Excel files using Apache POI. It allows for reading sheets, rows, and cells, and handles various cell types.
Since:
2025-05-30
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Shankar
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ExcelReaderUtil

      public ExcelReaderUtil()

  • Method Details

    • getPage

      public static void getPage(Object sheetValue)
      Retrieves the sheet from the workbook based on the provided sheet value, which can be either an index (Integer) or a name (String).
      Parameters:
      sheetValue - The index or name of the sheet to retrieve.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.
      IllegalArgumentException - if an unexpected value type is provided.

    • getRow

      public static void getRow(int i)
      Retrieves the row from the current sheet based on the provided row index.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the row to retrieve.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.

    • getCell

      public static void getCell(int i)
      Retrieves the cell from the current row based on the provided cell index.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the cell to retrieve.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.

    • getCellValue

      public static String getCellValue()
      Retrieves the value of the current cell based on its type. It handles different cell types such as STRING, NUMERIC, and FORMULA.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.
      NullPointerException - if the cell value is null.

    • getLastRowNum

      public static int getLastRowNum()
      Retrieves the value of the current cell as a String.
      Returns:
      The value of the cell as a String.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.
      NullPointerException - if the cell value is null.

    • getLastColNum

      public static int getLastColNum()
      Retrieves the last column number of the current row.
      Returns:
      The last column number of the current row.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the workbook is not initialized, is hidden, or if no sheets are found.

    • close

      public static void close(Closeable... resource)
      Closes the provided Closeable resources, such as FileInputStream or Workbook.
      Parameters:
      resource - The Closeable resources to close.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs while closing the resource.
